item.title: [PI] Dicing Bug [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { int dice = Misc.random(99)+1; for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); c2.sendMessage("<shad=15992320>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"</shad> rolled <shad=15992320>"+dice+"</shad> on the percentile dice."); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } }

no problem.

item.title: [PI] Dicing Bug [PI]
item.dc:creator: @webwebwebby webwebwebby
item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

My problem is with the dicing. You roll the dice and the system “yells” the number. However different clients see a different number. so it will say something like, “Steve rolled a 63.” on my client and “steve rolled a 23” on another client. Any help or advice on how to fix this would be appreciated, Heres the code.

if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; int dice = Misc.random(99)+1; c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); c2.sendMessage("<shad=15992320>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"</shad> rolled <shad=15992320>"+dice+"</shad> on the percentile dice."); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } }

If im hard to understand heres a picture

Read full topic
